title.rendered: Steven Lee | Director, Offshore Technical Services

content.rendered:
A Chief Engineer, Chartered Engineer and Fellow of the Institute of Marine Engineers with extensive experience in Rig and Vessel Inspection covering disciplines of, Mechanical, Well Control Equipment, Electrical, Dynamic Positioning and Marine. Possesses extensive experience as lead auditor during inspection and acceptance of a variety of offshore drilling rigs ranging from 7th Generation Mobile Offshore Drilling Unit (MODU) Drillship designs to land rigs.

Contact

Tyne & Wear | +44 (0)7834 593 095

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Specialising in casualty and accident investigation of Offshore Vessels and Drilling Rigs, specifically in the areas of Dynamic Positioning, Power Management, Marine Systems, Drilling Systems, Well Control Systems and Jacking Systems.
Expert Witness Expertise: Written expert opinion, witness of fact
